scripts.__rollup:chaos: cross-env GAME_TYPE=chaos npx rollup ./scripts/index.js --file index.js --format iife -c rollup.config.js
scripts.__rollup:order: cross-env GAME_TYPE=order npx rollup ./scripts/index.js --file index.js --format iife -c rollup.config.js
scripts.build:entries: npm run build:chaos && npm run build:order
